frame.name: Social_desirability
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains LUs which are like those of the Desirability frame except the Evaluee incorporates the Parameter as "associated with a percieved place in a social heirarchy" for all LUs. LUs are not restricted to positive or negative implications.
<ex><fex name="Evaluee">His manner of dress</fex> was <t>pedestrian</t> but tidy.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Evaluee
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged for its quality.
<ex> <fex name="Evaluee">His shirt</fex> seems very <t>common</t> compared to their modern fashions.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged good or bad.
<ex> His shirt seems <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>common</t> compared to their modern fashions.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Circumstances</fen> marks expressions that indicate a set of conditions under which the quality of the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged.</def-root>

FE.name: Comparison_set
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE marks expressions that indicate what class of things or events the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged against.
<ex> His shirt seems very <t>common</t> <fex name="Comparison_set">compared to their modern fashions</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Frame Element <fen>Depictive</fen> encodes a state that the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is in and which does not represent a temporary or hypothetical set of <fen>Circumstances</fen>.
<ex> His shirt seems very <t>common</t> <fex name="Depictive">with its generic logo</fex>.</ex></def-root>
